Keywords: Past , Robot , Scientist , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Peni Parker
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters, Elevated
MY KIND OF ALLIES: When establishing themed team, characters on your starting force with the Robot keyword gain the Spider-Man Family keyword.
CALL IN HELP FROM THE SPIDER-VERSE: When Steampunk Peni hits an opposing character, if no character has been placed this turn, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 3-6: Place another friendly character with the Spider-Man Family keyword adjacent.
ENGINEERED SOLUTIONS: Perplex. UNIQUE MODIFIER - When Steampunk Peni uses Perplex to target another friendly character with the Spider-Man Family keyword and doesn't choose damage, you may roll a d6 and instead modify the chosen value by half the result.

November 10, 2020
Mikeneto
I find it dissappointing most just use this figure for a super plex and named theme for robots and nothing more. I found a great play is to send her into battle (with HSS for Exospex or a Tk to add distance the the charge) then punch somebody, knock them back (all that feels like a D'va charge attack from overwatch), do a spider verse call in and then plex up the call in. I did exactly that with a Spider Hamurai with Peni. He had a 15 ( I got the +3) attack and two attack on the target. Had the target not KO'd they would have been Busheepdo locked and as good as dead.
